summary: This bill, the Protecting AI and Cloud Competition in Defense Act of 2025, aims to regulate how the Department of Defense procures cloud computing, data infrastructure, and foundation models. It mandates a competitive procurement process, protects government data rights, and prioritizes multi-cloud technology. The bill also includes provisions to protect government-furnished data used for AI development and requires reports to Congress on market competition and innovation in the AI space. It also outlines exemptions for national security concerns.
